keyFacts: Three staff members at the Metropolitan Correctional Center were placed on administrative leave following Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The staff placed on leave were Correctional Officer Tovia Noel, Material Handler Foreman Michael Thomas, and an unnamed Correctional Officer.
The warden of the facility was also reassigned.
These administrative actions were taken on August 12, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
